alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 7:58AM CST until January 04 at 8:45AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Baker County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 945 AM EST/845 AM CST/. * At 858 AM EST/758 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Columbia to 9 miles west of Donalsonville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Donalsonville, Gordon, Iron City, Brinson, Jakin, Saffold, Ausmac, Babcock, Crosby, Little Hope, Mayhaw, Boykin, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P, Bellview, Vada, Hopeful, Howards Mill and Davis Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
